mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.sbmc AS "sbmc", a.pp AS "pp", a.xh AS "xh", a.sl AS "sl", a.sbjg AS "sbjg", a.trsynf AS "trsynf"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_zyb( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, zyb_sbmc, zyb_pp, zyb_xh, zyb_sl, zyb_sbjg, zyb_trsynf ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{zyb_sbmc}, #{zyb_pp}, #{zyb_xh}, #{zyb_sl}, #{zyb_sbjg}, #{zyb_trsynf} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_zyb SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, zyb_sbmc = #{zyb_sbmc}, zyb_pp = #{zyb_pp}, zyb_xh = #{zyb_xh}, zyb_sl = #{zyb_sl}, zyb_sbjg = #{zyb_sbjg}, zyb_trsynf = #{zyb_trsynf} WHERE id = #{id}
